title: (x) 'No weak hearts': ultra-bold sans caps / type id - custom drawn by Dennis Payongayong {Aaron Carambula}
content:
just curious what this font is. I know girl skateboards uses it. here's the link

[http://friendsoftype.com/2010/01/dedicated/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106203422/http:/friendsoftype.com/2010/01/dedicated/ "http://friendsoftype.com/2010/01/dedicated/")
author: jrwilki

comments.content:
Hello Jason,

Dennis drew this type himself. Though one of our many plans is to begin to build real typefaces from our sketching, we haven't gotten 'round to it yet!

I would say Village's Mavis is comparable, but gets a pretty different flavor in the S and lc.

Cheers,

Aaron.  
Friends of Type.
wow, well that font is nothing short of awesome, cheers
